overview: An artist facing death. A deep and inspirring journey from darkness into light. The last days of Kollowalla, a russian gay artist in exile, who has to face his own death. A dreamlike, surreal journey of old memories and weird fantasies. A film inspired by great artists like Werner Schroeter, Derek Jarman, And Christoph Schlingensief and how they created impressive pieces of art, while they were in their dying process.
title: Kollowalla
